Title: Bug-Introducing Changes: A Case Study with Chrome
Purpose: Empirical Study on how bugs are introduced.
Elements_risk_assessment: The pc could be not the BIC
UseOF-SZZ: They use the SZZ to find the origins of a bug
Summary: to identify changes that created bugs and examine the conditions surrounding these changes.
Outcome: this paper summarizes known techniques for identifying bug-introducing changes and shows how generalizable these techniques are across different software projects.
